context:
List of University of Oxford people in British public life
Name | College | Notes
--- | --- | ---
Antony Acland | Christ Church | head of Diplomatic Service 1982-86 , ambassador to Washington 1986-91 , provost of Eton 1991-2000
Hugh James Arbuthnott | New College | Ambassador to Romania 1986-89 , Portugal 1989-93 , Denmark 1993-96
Julian Asquith , 2nd Earl of Oxford and Asquith | Balliol | Governor of the Seychelles 1962-67
Malcolm Barclay-Harvey | Christ Church | MP 1923-29 & 1931-39 , Governor South Australia 1939-44
Lord William Bentinck | Christ Church | Governor General of India 1828-35
James Bryce , 1st Viscount Bryce | Trinity and Oriel | MP 1880-1907 , Ambassador to the United States 1907-13
George Curzon , 1st Marquess Curzon of Kedleston | Balliol and All Souls | Viceroy of India 1899-1905 , Foreign Secretary 1919-24
John Hamilton-Gordon , 1st Marquess of Aberdeen and Temair |  | Governor General of Canada 1893-98
Frederick Hamilton-Temple-Blackwood , 1st Marquess of Dufferin and Ava | Christ Church | Gov Gen Canada 1872-78 , Viceroy India 1884-8
David Hannay , Baron Hannay of Chiswick | New College | Ambassador to EEC 1985-90 , to UN 1990-96 , UN Special Rep Cyprus 1996-2003
Sir James Harford | Balliol | Governor and Commander-in-Chief of Saint Helena 1954-58
Nicholas Henderson | Hertford | Ambassador to France 1975-79 , to the US 1979-82 , Lord Warden of the Stannaries 1985-90
Michael Jay , Baron Jay of Ewelme | Magdalen | Ambassador to France 1996-2001 ; Permanent Under-Secretary , FCO 2002-06
Gladwyn Jebb , 1st Baron Gladwyn | Magdalen | Acting Sec-Gen UN 1945-46 , Ambassador to UN 1950-54 , to France 1954-60 , MEP 1973-76
John Kerr , Baron Kerr of Kinlochard | Pembroke | Permanent Under-Sec , FCO 1997-2002 ; Sec Gen , European Convention 2000-03
Murray MacLehose , Baron MacLehose of Beoch | Balliol | Governor of Hong Kong 1971-82
John Maffey , 1st Baron Rugby | Christ Church | Gov-Gen Sudan 1926-33 , Perm Under-Sec for Colonies 33-37 , Rep to Ireland 39-48
Frederick Millar , 1st Baron Inchyra | New College | Ambassador , W. Germany 1955-56 , Permanent Under-Secy for Foreign Affairs 1957-62
Edward Mortimer | All Souls | Hd of Speechwriting Executive Office of the Sec Gen of the UN 1998- , Dir of Communications 2001-
Arthur Nicolson , 1st Baron Carnock |  | Ambassador to Spain 1904-5 , to Russia 1905-10 , Under-Secretary for Foreign Affairs 1910-16

wiki_section_title: Diplomats

wiki_section_text: 

intro: This is a list of University of Oxford people in British public life. Many were students at one (or more) of the colleges of the University, and others held fellowships at a college. This list forms part of a series of lists of people associated with the University of Oxford - for other lists, please see the main article List of University of Oxford people.

qa.question: As of 2018 , what was the estimated financial endowment of the Oxford University college John Kerr , Baron Kerr of Kinlochard attended ?

ott_21410_1.Query Analysis: The query seeks the estimated financial endowment of the Oxford University college that John Kerr, Baron Kerr of Kinlochard, attended as of 2018.
ott_21410_1.Query Keywords Extraction: 2018, financial endowment, Oxford University, John Kerr, Baron Kerr of Kinlochard, college
ott_21410_1.Answer Analysis: The answer provides the specific financial endowment amount, £58.5 million.
ott_21410_1.Document Content Analysis: The document lists various individuals associated with the University of Oxford, their colleges, and their notable positions. It includes John Kerr, Baron Kerr of Kinlochard, and specifies that he attended Pembroke College.
ott_21410_1.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document mentions 'John Kerr, Baron Kerr of Kinlochard' and 'Pembroke College', which are relevant to the query.
ott_21410_1.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: The document does not contain any financial figures or endowment information.
ott_21410_1.Key Information Matching: The document identifies the college John Kerr attended (Pembroke College), which is a key piece of information for the query, but lacks financial endowment details.
ott_21410_1.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not provide the financial endowment information for Pembroke College as of 2018.
ott_21410_1.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: Yes, the document helps identify the specific college John Kerr attended, which is a necessary step in finding the endowment information.
ott_21410_1.Explanation: While the document does not directly answer the query about the financial endowment, it provides crucial information about the college John Kerr attended. This makes it partially relevant as it aids in narrowing down the search for the endowment details.

However, it lacks direct information about John Kerr's college and the 2018 endowment figure, making it insufficient to fully answer the query.
